generated_question:
In the given geometric configuration, a regular triangle with center O1 and side length 4 is the base shape. A second triangle centered at O2 is derived by placing one of its vertices at O1, and a third triangle centered at O3 is obtained by translating the second triangle to the right. Point C lies on segment BE, and point O1 is the center of the base triangle. Line segment CO1 is drawn connecting these two points.

What is the measurement of line segment CO1?
